ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: The fixed code to use when the mode = 'fixed'  - all unmapped codes are mapped to a single fixed code.

ivardefs.name: display
ivardefs.desc: The display for the code. The display is only provided to help editors when editing the concept map.

ivardefs.name: mode
ivardefs.desc: Defines which action to take if there is no match in the group. One of 3 actions is possible: use the unmapped code (this is useful when doing a mapping between versions, and only a few codes have changed), use a fixed code (a default code), or alternativ

ivardefs.name: url
ivardefs.desc: The canonical URL of the map to use if this map contains no mapping.

properties.desc: What to do when there is no match in the mappings in the group.
